MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Lime Avenue and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:43PM on 16th March 2021.
